description: Curvature and modal deformation family controlling geometric bending and cross-mode interactions.

tri\_unity\_connections.delta: λ→δ generates δ-like deviation from curvature.

mu\_connections.weight\_effect: μ rescales curvature density via λ⋅μ coupling.
mu\_connections.adjacency\_effect: μ modifies local curvature adjacency tensors.

psi\_connections.resonance: Cross-mode curvature λˣ appears in ψ×Φ interactions.
